Simple ECommerce App

  • Products list
  • Cart
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'My App'; show: string = 'products'; toggleView(view: string): void { this.show = view; } }
